content: You need 10 or more tb of fast disk (assuming geth). Maybe only 2 tb for eragon. Get takes more than a week. Probably closer to 2 or 3 weeks if not more. Don't know about eragaon or other clients.

author: roberto.bayardo
content: Why is Geth so much more than eragon/others <@!364458974906548225>?  I was also thinking of running an archival node. I just finished syncing a full node and Geth is 466g.  Finished in a couple days (not bad).

author: jlokier
content: I recently synced a full node Geth in <6 hours with snap sync, and 25 hours with fast sync.  But I would expect weeks for Geth archive mode sync.  The different kinds of sync do very different calculations.  Erigon did archive mode sync (no pruning) in 3 days 3 hours on the same system.  Erigon took about 1.5TB when it was done, but it's up to 1.7TB now (both numbers rounded to nearest 0.1TB).

author: vorot93
content:
